## CircularSinglyLinkedList.next() method

Returns the next list node, if extant; else, null

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
next(node: IForwardNode<T, CircularSinglyLinkedList<T>>): IForwardNode<T, CircularSinglyLinkedList<T>> | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | IForwardNode&lt;T, [CircularSinglyLinkedList](./connective-tissue.circularsinglylinkedlist.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A valid node, which must be a member of this list (return null if the given node is not a member). If this constraint is satisfied, return the next node from the given node. |

IForwardNode&lt;T, [CircularSinglyLinkedList](./connective-tissue.circularsinglylinkedlist.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; \| null
